name: Skular's Salvation
flavorText: Skular was one of the few Barbarians to survive Baal's destruction of Sescheron. These bracers are the reason.
flavorTextHtml: Skular was one of the few Barbarians to survive Baal's destruction of Sescheron. These bracers are the reason.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Increase the damage of Ancient Spear - Boulder Toss by 100%. When your Boulder Toss hits 5 or fewer enemies, the damage is increased by 145%. (Barbarian Only) [120 - 150]%
secondary.text: Increase the damage of Ancient Spear - Boulder Toss by 100%. When your Boulder Toss hits 5 or fewer enemies, the damage is increased by 145%. (Barbarian Only) [120 - 150]%
